images.copyright: Winter in Oymyakon, Russia (© Alexandr Berdicevschi/Getty Images)
images.title: Brrrrrrrr
images.caption: Oymyakon, Russia
images.desc: Oymyakon, Russia, is one of a few places claiming to be the coldest spot in the Northern Hemisphere, a northern 'Pole of Cold.' Centuries of evolving meteorological technology means some historic cold temperatures are considered more accurate than others. The record for ultimate cold is a hot debate.
